
name: 🐳 Docker Compose Auto Build Check

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "**" ]
    paths:
      - 'frontend/**'
      - 'backend/**'
      - 'docker-compose.yml'
      - '**/Dockerfile'
      - 'package.json'
      - 'requirements.txt'
  pull_request:
    branches: [ "main" ]
    paths:
      - 'frontend/**'
      - 'backend/**'
      - 'docker-compose.yml'
      - '**/Dockerfile'
      - 'package.json'
      - 'requirements.txt'

      
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: ⬇️ Checkout Repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: 🐳 Set up Docker
        uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v3

      - name: 🔨 Build Docker Compose Services
        run: docker compose build
